translations.homeSlogan: A webpage for creating and keeping motivation. For trying out new things, exploring uncharted territories with new challenges. Always giving the best you can and reaching out for more experiences.
translations.challengeFinished: Nice! You finished your {{duration}} days challenge!
translations.youHaveToAuthenticate: You have to authenticate before we can load this page. Please visit the <1>login</1> page.
